scripts.dev-install: (cd api && npm install) & (cd app && npm install)
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development && cp env/.env.dev api/dev-build/.env && (cd api && npm run dev) & (cd app && npm run dev)
scripts.build: rm -r dist && ((cd app && npm run build) & (cd api && npm run build)) && npm run build-only
scripts.start-test: cp env/.env.test dist/.env && cd dist && npm run start
scripts.install-stage: rm -r install-stage && cp -r dist install-stage && cp env/.env.stage install-stage/.env && pm2 restart stage --update-env
scripts.install-prod: rm -r install-prod && cp -r dist install-prod && cp env/.env.prod install-prod/.env && pm2 restart prod --update-env
scripts.prebuild-only: cd build-helpers && npm run build && npm install
